Reservation - Class in RRPSS
An object of the Reservation Class specifies the parameters of a single Reservation such as number of people who are catered to by the reservation, name of the customer creating the Reservation and the time of the specified Reservation
Reservation() - Constructor for class RRPSS.Reservation
Constructs a new Reservation Object with the Calendar timestamp set to 1 January 2050, 1200 hours by default
Reservation(int, Customer, Calendar) - Constructor for class RRPSS.Reservation
Constructs a Reservation with the specified number of people catered to by the reservation(pax), Customer object making the Reservation and the Calendar timestamp for the Reservation.
ReservationMgr - Class in RRPSS
A manager class that handles the Reservation Entities, reads and writes reservations to file that stores the employees, checks table availabilities and capacity, checks, removes, and creates reservations, checks expiry of reservations and other related functions.

ReservationsFile - Class in RRPSS
The class represents as a boundary class which interacts with the external Reservations database
